Property.name: Class
Property.Abstract: the OpenDMA Class describing this Object

Property.name: Id
Property.Abstract: the unique object identifier identifying this Object inside its Repository

Property.name: Guid
Property.Abstract: the global unique object identifier globally identifying this Object

Property.name: Repository
Property.Abstract: the OpenDMA Repository where this Object resides

Class.name: Class
Class.Description: The Class specific version of the {@link OdmaObject} interface that offers short cuts to all defined OpenDMA properties.

Property.name: Name
Property.Abstract: the internal (technical) name of this Class

Property.name: NameQualifier
Property.Abstract: the name qualifier of this Class

Property.name: DisplayName
Property.Abstract: the display name of this Class to be displayed to end users

Property.name: Parent
Property.Abstract: the parent Class that is extended by this Class

Property.name: Aspects
Property.Abstract: the list of aspects that are implemented by this Class

Property.name: DeclaredProperties
Property.Abstract: the list of properties that are desclared by this Class (does not contain inherited properties).

Property.name: Properties
Property.Abstract: the list of properties that are effective for objects of this Class. Contains inherited and declared properties.

Property.name: Aspect
Property.Abstract: whether this Class describes an Aspect or a valid class object

Property.name: Instantiable
Property.Abstract: whether Objects of this Class can be created or not

Property.name: Hidden
Property.Abstract: whether this Class should be displayed to end users or not

Property.name: System
Property.Abstract: whether this Class is defined by the system (true) or by users (false)

Property.name: Retrievable
Property.Abstract: whether objects of this class can be retrieved from a session by their id or not

Property.name: Searchable
Property.Abstract: whether objects of this class can be found by a search query or not

Property.name: SubClasses
Property.Abstract: the list of Classes that extend this class (i.e. that contain a reference to this Class in their parent property)

Property.name: Name
Property.Abstract: the internal (technical) name of this PropertyInfo

Property.name: NameQualifier
Property.Abstract: the name qualifier of this PropertyInfo

Property.name: DisplayName
Property.Abstract: the display name of this PropertyInfo to be displayed to end users

Property.name: DataType
Property.Abstract: the numeric ID of the data type described by this PropertyInfo

Property.name: ReferenceClass
Property.Abstract: the required Class of the object referenced by this property if this PropertyInfo

Property.name: MultiValue
Property.Abstract: whether Objects of this Class can be created or not

Property.name: Required
Property.Abstract: whether Objects of this Class can be created or not

Property.name: ReadOnly
Property.Abstract: whether this Class should be displayed to end users or not

Property.name: Hidden
Property.Abstract: whether this Class should be displayed to end users or not

Property.name: System
Property.Abstract: whether this Class is defined by the system (true) or by users (false)

Property.name: Choices
Property.Abstract: set of possible choices the values of this property is limited to or null if there are no constraints for the value of this property

Property.name: DisplayName
Property.Abstract: the display name of this Choice to be displayed to end users

Property.name: StringValue
Property.Abstract: the String value of this choice or null, if the property info this choice is assigned to is not of data type String

Property.name: IntegerValue
Property.Abstract: the Integer value of this choice or null, if the property info this choice is assigned to is not of data type Integer

Property.name: ShortValue
Property.Abstract: the Short value of this choice or null, if the property info this choice is assigned to is not of data type Short

Property.name: LongValue
Property.Abstract: the Long value of this choice or null, if the property info this choice is assigned to is not of data type Long

Property.name: FloatValue
Property.Abstract: the Float value of this choice or null, if the property info this choice is assigned to is not of data type Float

Property.name: DoubleValue
Property.Abstract: the Double value of this choice or null, if the property info this choice is assigned to is not of data type Double

Property.name: BooleanValue
Property.Abstract: the Boolean value of this choice or null, if the property info this choice is assigned to is not of data type Boolean

Property.name: DateTimeValue
Property.Abstract: the DateTime value of this choice or null, if the property info this choice is assigned to is not of data type DateTime

Property.name: BLOBValue
Property.Abstract: the BLOB value of this choice or null, if the property info this choice is assigned to is not of data type BLOB

Property.name: ReferenceValue
Property.Abstract: the Reference value of this choice or null, if the property info this choice is assigned to is not of data type Reference

Property.name: Name
Property.Abstract: the internal (technical) name of this Repository

Property.name: DisplayName
Property.Abstract: the display name of this Repository to be displayed to end users

Property.name: RootClass
Property.Abstract: the root Class of the class hierarchy in this Repository

Property.name: RootAspects
Property.Abstract: the list of Classes that represent an Aspect and that do not inherit another aspect

Property.name: RootFolder
Property.Abstract: the root Folder of a dedicated folder tree in this Repository (if any)

Property.name: Title
Property.Abstract: the title of this Document

Property.name: Version
Property.Abstract: the version string describing this version of this Document (e.g. 1.0, 1.1, 1.2, 2.0)

Property.name: VersionCollection
Property.Abstract: reference to a VersionCollection object containing the collection of all versions of this Document along with other information

Property.name: VersionIndependentId
Property.Abstract: the unique object identifier identifying this logical document independent from the specific version inside its Repository

Property.name: VersionIndependentGuid
Property.Abstract: the global unique object identifier globally identifying this logical document independent from the specific version

Property.name: ContentElements
Property.Abstract: the collection of all ContentElements this Document consists of

Property.name: CombinedContentType
Property.Abstract: the combined mime type that has been build over all ContentElements this Document consists of

Property.name: PrimaryContentElement
Property.Abstract: the primary ContentElements that represents this Document

Property.name: CreatedAt
Property.Abstract: the date when this version of this Document has been created

Property.name: CreatedBy
Property.Abstract: the user who has created this version of this Document

Property.name: LastModifiedAt
Property.Abstract: the date when this version of this Document has been modified the last time

Property.name: LastModifiedBy
Property.Abstract: the user who has modified this version of this Document the last time

Property.name: CheckedOut
Property.Abstract: true if and only if this Document is checked out

Property.name: CheckedOutAt
Property.Abstract: the date when this Document has been checked out

Property.name: CheckedOutBy
Property.Abstract: the user who has checked out this Document

Property.name: ContentType
Property.Abstract: the mime type describing how the Content of this ContentElement has to be interpreted

Property.name: Position
Property.Abstract: the position of this element in the list of all content elements of the containing document

Property.name: Content
Property.Abstract: the binary content of this ContentElement as octets

Property.name: Size
Property.Abstract: the number of octests the binary content of this ContentElement consists of

Property.name: FileName
Property.Abstract: the optional file name of this ContentElement

Property.name: Location
Property.Abstract: the URI where the content is stored

Property.name: Versions
Property.Abstract: collection of all versions of the Document

Property.name: Latest
Property.Abstract: the latest version of this Document

Property.name: Released
Property.Abstract: the last released version of this Document

Property.name: InProgress
Property.Abstract: the version of this Document currently beeing worked on during a checkout. Only valid if and only if the corresponding Document is checked out.

Property.name: CreatedAt
Property.Abstract: the date when this Document has been created

Property.name: CreatedBy
Property.Abstract: the user who has created this Document

Property.name: Title
Property.Abstract: the title of this Container

Property.name: Containees
Property.Abstract: the collection of all Containable objects that are contained in this Container

Property.name: Associations
Property.Abstract: the collection of all Associations between this Container and its containees

Property.name: CreatedAt
Property.Abstract: the date when this Container has been created

Property.name: CreatedBy
Property.Abstract: the user who has created this Container

Property.name: LastModifiedAt
Property.Abstract: the date when this Container has been modified the last time

Property.name: LastModifiedBy
Property.Abstract: the user who has modified this Container the last time

Property.name: Parent
Property.Abstract: the Folder this Folder is a sub folder of

Property.name: SubFolders
Property.Abstract: the collection of Folders which have this Folder in their parent ptoperty

Property.name: ContainedIn
Property.Abstract: the collection of Containers this Containable is contained in

Property.name: ContainedInAssociations
Property.Abstract: the collection of Associations that bind this Containable in the Containers

Property.name: Name
Property.Abstract: the name of this Association

Property.name: Container
Property.Abstract: the Container of this Association in which the containable is said to be contained

Property.name: Containable
Property.Abstract: the Containable of this Association which is said to be contained in the container

Property.name: CreatedAt
Property.Abstract: the date when this Association has been created

Property.name: CreatedBy
Property.Abstract: the user who has created this Association

Property.name: LastModifiedAt
Property.Abstract: the date when this Association has been modified the last time

Property.name: LastModifiedBy
Property.Abstract: the user who has modified this Association the last time
